fields.description: Example: ABCD.#####. If series is set and Batch No is not mentioned in transactions, then automatic batch number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Batch No for this item, leave this blank. Note: this setting will take priority over the Naming Series Prefix in Stock Settings.
fields.label: Batch Number Series

fields.description: Maximum sample quantity that can be retained

fields.description:
Example: ABCD.#####
If series is set and Serial No is not mentioned in transactions, then automatic serial number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Serial Nos for this item. leave this blank.
fields.label: Serial Number Series
